title: ADR Frontmatter
description: Frontmatter metadata for an Architecture Decision Record

status.description: Current lifecycle status of the ADR

date.description: ISO-8601 date when the decision was recorded (YYYY-MM-DD)

deciders.description: People involved in making this decision

items.description: Domain item reference in context.Name format (e.g. ordering.OrderPlaced)

domain_refs.description: Domain items related to this decision

superseded_by.description: ID of the ADR that supersedes this one
